entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
